content.description: Climb the slab from the large blocky feature left of the crack.
content.location: West side of the Samurai (Cracked Egg) boulder.

content.description: A mega classic fun line of technical pinching and body tension.  Start sitting matched on the obvious chalked "nose" at the bottom of the scoop and move up through opposing slopey pinches in the roof above the scoop, finishing with a pull to a great edge over the lip and a bucket.  Feels wickedly sandbagged at first and then when you figure it out is dead on for the grade.
content.protection: pads - there's a rock right under your ass you will land on.
content.location: On the "Cracked Egg" boulder in the topo on this site.  It's the obvious chalked line starting low in the big scoop on the southwest side of the boulder.

content.description:
Style your way up and right through underclings and interesting crack features before cutting back left to an obvious protruding crimp. A committing exit move high off the deck brings you to a slopey top-out just right of the apex.

This is a sick slabby climb.
content.location: Backside of the Samurai boulder. SDS on the low triangular hold in front of the tree below the slab.

content.description: Blank face except for a large shelf about head high on the southeast corner of the cracked-egg boulder in the east forest up the motorcycle trail. Start matched on shelf and mantle up....going up from here is currently a project and needs cleaning. Rating to be adjusted after complete send of this route.
content.location: Cracked Egg boulder in East Forest on Motorcycle trail. Southeast corner.

content.description: Begin on the low, broken edges on the vertical face. Move up and right to a distinct crimp and exit right using the deep pocket.
content.location: North side of the Samurai (Cracked Egg) boulder.

content.description: SDS under small roof and ascend up to the right of the blocky corner. Fun, short route.
content.location: On the cracked egg boulder in the east forest on the motorcycle trail. Northeast corner

content.description: Start crouched under the prow using a thin left-hand crimp and right-hand pinch. Move up opposing edges and throw for the lip.
content.location: North face of Samurai (Cracked Egg) boulder. Just left of The Samurai.

content.description: Start using the protuding block and top out via the arete.
content.location: SW side of the boulder at the obvious protruding block.
